mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NoticeBoard (cnt, category, title, writer, writerId, content, date) VALUES (#{cnt}, #{category}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{writerId}, #{content}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NoticeBoard ORDER BY date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE NoticeBoard SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, writerId = #{writerId}, content = #{content}, date = #{date} WHERE cnt = #{cnt}
